name: Mikio Yamamoto
content: Mikio Yamamoto Mikio Yamamoto Associate Professor Graduate School of Systems and Information Engineering, Department of Computer Science, University of Tsukuba, 1-1-1 Tennodai, Tsukuba, 305-8573 Japan. Email: myama AT cs.tsukuba.ac.jp Tel: +81-29-853-6559 Fax: +81-29-853-5809 Research Interests Natural Language Processing Japanese Morphlogical Analyzer based on extended-characters Language modeling using untagged corpus Extraction of semantic information from corpus Applications of Suffix Arrays C codes to compute tf and df for all substrings Spoken Language Processing Language modeling for speech recognizer Speech corpora Publications Papers in English Papers in Japanese
